front.title: Hunt Down And Destroy The Jedi / Their Fire Has Gone Out Of The Universe (V)
front.gametext: Hunt Down And Destroy The Jedi: Deploy Vader's Castle, [Set 13] Visage Of The Emperor, and a [Cloud City] site with exactly one [Dark Side]. {For} remainder of game, you may not deploy characters except bounty hunters, droids, and Imperials. Where you have an Inquisitor, your total battle destiny is +1 (+2 if with a 'Hatred' card). Inquisitors are destiny +1. {While} this side up, once per turn, may deploy a [Cloud City] or Malachor battleground site from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. {Flip} this card if Vader is at a battleground site unless Luke, a Jedi, or a Padawan at a battleground site. Their Fire Has Gone Out Of The Universe: {While} this side up, you lose no Force from Visage Of The Emperor. While Vader armed with a lightsaber, opponent's Force drain bonuses are canceled. {Flip} this card if Vader not on table or if Luke, a Jedi, or a Padawan at a battleground site; once per game, may take Vader and your cards on him into hand from a site you control.
